item.title: Data Science using Agile Methodology
item.description: body { text-align: justify} INTRODUCTION A data science team asks great questions, explores the data, and delivers key insights. The best way to generate business value is to deliver a constant stream of key insights in short two-week sprints. A short sprint will also help the team pivot so they can ask new questions based on what they learn from the data. WORK ON A DATA SCIENCE PROJECT Typical project upfront requirements and we need to understand what we are going to build before to start the planning project.
